name: get_directory_memory_usage
description: Calculate memory usage for files and subdirectories in a given directory.

recursive.description: Whether to include subdirectories. Defaults to True.

file_extension.description: Filter files by extension (e.g., '.txt'). Defaults to None (all files).

sort_by_size.description: Whether to sort results by size in descending order. Defaults to False.

output_file.description: Path to save the results as a CSV or JSON file. Defaults to None (no saving).
